channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: CEO of Oura has 4 predictions for the $80 billion wearable tech industry—including growing his customer base by millions of people
item.description: “The amount of data is getting bigger and broader," says CEO of Oura Tom Hale.

item.title: How Amazon and Walmart’s retail dominance could be disrupted by ChatGPT and Perplexity
item.description: Serial e-commerce entrepreneur, and ReFiBuy founder, Scot Wingo lays out the vision.

item.title: The S&P 500 has retaken all-time highs. Here’s how much European and Chinese stocks raced ahead while U.S. markets regained lost ground
item.description: Where would the S&P 500 be today if Trump hadn't shocked Wall Street with much steeper-than-expected tariffs?

item.title: Nvidia breakout puts $4 trillion market value within reach
item.description: Nvidia shares have rallied back to a record.

item.title: Fortune 500 giants Nike and Walmart are warning of upcoming price hikes, but tariff-wary Americans are already pulling back on spending
item.description: A key inflation gauge moved higher in May in the latest sign that prices remain stubbornly elevated.

item.title: Why the S&P 500 is on the cusp of the seventh great breakout since the 1990s
S&P 500 pushes to all-time intraday high on trade-deal optimism
Robinhood’s Vlad Tenev led a trading revolution to become a Wall Street power
Trump cuts off trade talks with Canada. This tax is the key.
What drove stocks' record-breaking week? Growing rate-cut expectations.
